question: Can we read “aisha” and “tahajad” together after sleeping and wake up after 12 of night?
answer:
QUESTION
Can we read ?aisha? and ?tahajad? together after sleeping and wake up after 12 of night?
ANSWER


Share:
It is Makrooh (disliked) to perform Esha Salaat after half the night. However, if the Salaat is performed, the Salaat will be valid.

Time for Tahajjud is the last quarter of the night. However, it may be performed after the Esha Salaat before the last quarter.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
